data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Béja. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Béja, Tunisia

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Béja hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary: On average, 60 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Béja, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide seekers in Béja, Tunisia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 303,000 souls living in the state of Béja with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Béja, Tunisia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Béja, Tunisia.
Father, encourage the 90 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Béja
location.cities_list: Béja, Medjez el Bab, Testour, Tabursuq, Sejenane
location.cities_list_w_pop: Béja (57,233), Medjez el Bab (20,118), Testour (13,397), Tabursuq (12,727), Sejenane (5,718)
